html:
The Dorsett Archive

A visual diary of travels, projects, and inspirations.

View All
css: .overlap-cards-gallery-section { font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; background-color: #ECEFF1; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; padding: 4rem 2rem; } .overlap-cards-gallery-container { position: relative; width: 100%; max-width: 1000px; height: 600px; } .overlap-cards-gallery-card { position: absolute; border-radius: 12px; box-shadow: 0 15px 35px rgba(0,0,0,0.2); overflow: hidden; transition: transform 0.4s ease, z-index 0.4s ease; } .overlap-cards-gallery-card.image-card:hover { transform: scale(1.05) translateY(-10px); z-index: 10; } .overlap-cards-gallery-card img { width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: cover; } .text-card { width: 350px; height: 250px; background: #FFFFFF; top: 50%; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); z-index: 5; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; padding: 2rem; } .text-card h2 { font-size: 2rem; margin: 0 0 1rem; color: #263238; } .text-card p { font-size: 1rem; color: #546E7A; line-height: 1.6; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; } .text-card a { font-weight: 600; color: #000000; text-decoration: none; } .card-1 { width: 300px; height: 450px; top: 0; left: 0; transform: rotate(-10deg); } .card-2 { width: 320px; height: 220px; top: 10%; right: 0; transform: rotate(8deg); } .card-3 { width: 250px; height: 350px; bottom: 0; left: 15%; transform: rotate(5deg); } .card-4 { width: 380px; height: 280px; bottom: 5%; right: 10%; transform: rotate(-6deg); } @media (max-width: 992px) { .overlap-cards-gallery-container { height: auto; position: static; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; gap: 2rem; } .overlap-cards-gallery-card { position: static; transform: none !important; width: 80%; max-width: 400px; } .text-card { order: -1; height: auto; text-align: center; } .image-card { height: 300px; } } @media (max-width: 576px) { .overlap-cards-gallery-section { padding: 2rem 1rem; } .overlap-cards-gallery-card { width: 100%; } }
js: window.addEventListener('load', () => { document.querySelectorAll('img[src^="https://pixabay.com/api/"]').forEach(img => { fetch(img.src).then(response => response.json()).then(data => { if (data.hits && data.hits.length > 0) { img.src = data.hits[0].largeImageURL; } else { img.src = 'https://via.placeholder.com/1280x720?text=Image+Not+Found'; } }).catch(error => { console.error('Error fetching Pixabay image:', error); img.src = 'https://via.placeholder.com/1280x720?text=Image+Not+Found'; }); }); });
